name: HeyMuse-GroupChat
0:
”Alexa, open Hey Muse”
”Alexa, join channel 'Seahawks' using Hey Muse”
”Alexa, say 'hello everyone' using Hey Muse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hey muse
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Alexa to group chat with other people - no typing required!

Don't watch live events by yourself. Bring your friends into your home using Hey Muse!
- Watching a sporting event
- Watching an eSports live-stream
- Watching the season premiere of your favorite show

It's easy to get started!
1) Launch the skill
└─ Alexa, Open Hey Muse
2) Pick a name for your avatar
3) You will now be inside the channel "Welcome Chat"
4) You will now hear messages from other users as they arrive
5) Send voice messages
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to say 'hello everyone'

You may also join or create a different channel
└─ Join channel 'Seahawks'
└─ Create channel 'my channel'

== All Commands ==
Launch
└─ Alexa, open Hey Muse

List active channels
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to list channels

Join a channel
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to join channel 'Seahawks'

Create a channel
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to create channel 'my channel'

Send a message
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to say 'hello everyone'

Log out
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to log out

Report/Mute user
└─ Alexa, tell Hey Muse to report 'User Name'

Ask for help
└─ Alexa, ask Hey Muse for help
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
